cal_devices_2col.label:

text.default: Change the color of this tile based on the temperature value.
Change the color of this tile based on the humidity value.

zoomy.label: Add ZOOMY (This checkbox will uncheck itself after update)

text.default: <small>Temporarily add a calibration helper tile to generate the perfect css for alignment of columns to the edge of the screen on any device, any device display dpi setting.</small>
Regardless of whether there is overflow, scrollbars will be enabled but hidden.

header.label: Header Theme
header.text: Change the size and position and visibility of the dashboard header..

label.label: Add/Replace Label
label.type: For image and video tiles, this will add a highly visible label. For others this will replace the existing label.

text.default: Nudge the icon slightly to give it more space..
text.attribute: Nudge the icon away from the value slightly to give it more space..

text.default: For attribute tiles, this will add your custom unit label immediately after the tile value.
This is normally used to increase attribute tile font size to match temperature, humidity and other numeric-based tile types.
For text tiles, you might want to change the horizontal alignment.
For some tiles, you'll want to change the title color to make it more visible.
Make everything within the tile x times larger.
text.thermostat: Make everything within the thermostat tile x times larger.
text.attribute: Make the content of this tile x times larger while keeping the title the same size.

text.default: Hide the text, only show the icon.
Change the layout of this tile to be more button-like.
text.dashboard: Change the layout of this Dashboard Link to be a stacked large icon and small text.

text.default: The tile text and icon color (overrides state colors).  Format: rgba(x,x,x,x).
The tile background color (overrides state colors).  Format: rgba(x,x,x,x).
The tile border color.  FormatL: rgba(x,x,x,x).
The width (in pixels) of the tile border.  Border Color required to see it.
Warning: may not work well with Buttonize mod.
Remove the title and attempt to center the contents of the tile vertically.
